titleStmt.title: A message to the Philadelphian Society whithersoever dispersed over the whole earth. Together with, a call to the several gathered churches among Protestants in this nation of England. By J. Lead.
titleStmt.author: Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by J. Bradford, at Jewen-Street, near Crowder's-Well,

notesStmt.note: With separate dated title page, lacking author statement, on p. 1.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
